page.description: Returns table of link if field is a linking key, blank if field is not a linking key.
page.discussion: The .LINK_TABLE_GET() method returns the name of the table that the field links to.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example shows that in the invoice set the customer_id field is a linking field that connects to the customer table. The date field is not a linking field.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim fld as P tbl = table.open("invoice.set") fld = tbl.field_get("customer_id") ? fld.link_table_get() = "CUSTOMER" ? fld.link_type_get() = "First" fld = tbl.field_get("date") ? fld.link_table_get() = "" ? fld.link_type_get() = ""
